name: Project Identification
title: PROJECT
definition: Identifies the project with which the request is to be associated.
usageNotes: Required when the ACT field is “N” or “D” and the   CCVN field is populated otherwise optional.
fieldNotes: Examples of the use of this field would be relating   multiple Access Service Requests previously    negotiated orders etc.
The provider may initiate the project identification   and provide this to the customer who will populate   the field when submitting an ASR.
The Project Number must be entered by the new   and the former customers on “N” and “D”   coordinated conversion orders.
